Axis Bank.annual_fee: First year free. ₹499/year after unless annual spend > ₹20,000.
Axis Bank.rewards: 5% cashback on groceries. Earn ₹2,100 + 1,750 GroMo coins.
Axis Bank.eligibility: Salaried or self-employed individuals with regular income.

IndusInd Bank.annual_fee: ₹499 per year. Waived if annual spend > ₹25,000.

KreditBee.eligibility: Aadhar, PAN and selfie required. Age 21–60.

Olyv.eligibility: Valid KYC and bank account required.

Axis Bank.documents_required: PAN and Aadhaar required. Video KYC.

Upstox.charges: Free account opening. ₹20 per trade thereafter.
Upstox.features: Invest in stocks, mutual funds, IPOs.

Paytm UPI.features: Instant payments, linked to bank account.

Axis Mutual Fund.features: Diversified mutual fund options with professional management.
Axis Mutual Fund.benefits: Long-term wealth creation and tax savings under 80C.
